notes.text: Siemens has released a new version for SIMATIC RTLS Locating Manager and recommends to update to the latest version.
notes.title: Summary

notes.text:
As a general security measure, Siemens strongly recommends to protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms. In order to operate the devices in a protected IT environment, Siemens recommends to configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for Industrial Security (Download: 
https://www.siemens.com/cert/operational-guidelines-industrial-security), and to follow the recommendations in the product manuals.
Additional information on Industrial Security by Siemens can be found at: https://www.siemens.com/industrialsecurity

document.title: SSA-707630: Multiple Vulnerabilities in SIMATIC RTLS Locating Manager Before V3.3

notes.text: Affected devices do not properly validate input sent to its listening port on the local loopback interface. This could allow an unauthenticated local attacker to cause a denial of service condition.
notes.title: Summary

remediations.details: Update to V3.3 or later version

notes.text: Affected SIMATIC RTLS Locating Manager Report Clients do not properly protect credentials that are used to authenticate to the server. This could allow an authenticated local attacker to extract the credentials and use them to escalate their access rights from the Manager to the Systemadministrator role.
notes.title: Summary

remediations.details: Update to V3.3 or later version
